20110104170038.000|20110104170040.000|TR0|official John Wheeler was last seen 
20110104170040.000|20110104170043.000|TR0|December 30th in Wilmington.  Wheeler's 
20110104170043.000|20110104170046.000|TR0|body was found the next day in a landfill. 
20110104170046.000|20110104170048.000|TR0| Police are still trying to pinpoint the 
20110104170048.000|20110104170051.000|TR0|primary crime scene.  Wheeler was a key 
20110104170051.000|20110104170053.000|TR0|force behind the Vietnam Veterans Memorial.

20110104170056.000|20110104170059.000|TR0|A new blood test is being developed to 
20110104170059.000|20110104170101.000|TR0|detect if you have cancer. Researchers say 
20110104170101.000|20110104170104.000|TR0|it will find a single cancer cell among 
20110104170104.000|20110104170107.000|TR0|billions of healthy ones.  It could 
20110104170107.000|20110104170109.000|TR0|revolutionize the fight against the deadly 
20110104170109.000|20110104170112.000|TR0|disease.

20110104170314.000|20110104170317.000|TR0|WIAN (voice-over):  More than a year and a 
20110104170317.000|20110104170320.000|TR0|half later, the cause of Michael Jackson's 
20110104170320.000|20110104170322.000|TR0|death is clear -- acute intoxication of 
20110104170322.000|20110104170325.000|TR0|Propofol, a powerful surgical sedative.  
20110104170325.000|20110104170328.000|TR0|But who caused the death remains the

20110104170543.000|20110104170546.000|TR0|
20110104170546.000|20110104170549.000|TR0|President Obama returned to Washington 
20110104170549.000|20110104170551.000|TR0|within the last hour, and one of his first 
20110104170551.000|20110104170554.000|TR0|acts of business is to sign the most 
20110104170554.000|20110104170556.000|TR0|sweeping overhaul of food safety since 
20110104170556.000|20110104170559.000|TR0|1938.  Under the new law, the FDA will 
20110104170559.000|20110104170602.000|TR0|have the power to issue direct recalls of 
20110104170602.000|20110104170604.000|TR0|tainted foods.        The secretary of 
20110104170604.000|20110104170607.000|TR0|Health and Human Services would be 
20110104170607.000|20110104170609.000|TR0|required to create a food tracing system 
20110104170609.000|20110104170612.000|TR0|to find sources of contamination.  Food 
20110104170612.000|20110104170615.000|TR0|producers will be required to develop 
20110104170615.000|20110104170617.000|TR0|written safety plans, and importers would 
20110104170617.000|20110104170620.000|TR0|have to verify the safety of all imported 
20110104170620.000|20110104170622.000|TR0|foods.
20110104170622.000|20110104170625.000|TR0|
20110104170625.000|20110104170628.000|TR0|House Republicans are wasting no time in 
20110104170628.000|20110104170630.000|TR0|their push to repeal President Obama's 
20110104170630.000|20110104170633.000|TR0|signature accomplishment, health care 
20110104170633.000|20110104170636.000|TR0|reform. They've already set the stage for 
20110104170636.000|20110104170638.000|TR0|a vote even before they officially take 
20110104170638.000|20110104170641.000|TR0|control of the House tomorrow.  A key 
20110104170641.000|20110104170643.000|TR0|procedural vote is scheduled for Friday, a 
20110104170643.000|20110104170646.000|TR0|final House vote is expected next 
20110104170646.000|20110104170649.000|TR0|Wednesday. However, the repeal stands 
20110104170649.000|20110104170651.000|TR0|little chance of passage in the Senate.
20110104170651.000|20110104170654.000|TR0|
20110104170654.000|20110104170656.000|TR0|While Republicans focus on trying to 
20110104170656.000|20110104170659.000|TR0|repeal health care reform, new benefits 
20110104170659.000|20110104170702.000|TR0|from the law kick in this year.  Seniors 
20110104170702.000|20110104170704.000|TR0|will get more help with prescription drug 
20110104170704.000|20110104170707.000|TR0|costs.  They can get a 50 percent discount 
20110104170707.000|20110104170709.000|TR0|on name-brand drugs if in the coverage gap 
20110104170709.000|20110104170712.000|TR0|known as the doughnut hole. Also, 
20110104170712.000|20110104170715.000|TR0|preventive care like annual physicals and 
20110104170715.000|20110104170717.000|TR0|cancer screenings will be covered by 
20110104170717.000|20110104170720.000|TR0|Medicare.
20110104170720.000|20110104170723.000|TR0|
20110104170723.000|20110104170725.000|TR0|Insurance companies will be required to 
20110104170725.000|20110104170728.000|TR0|spend 80 to 85 percent of your health care 
20110104170728.000|20110104170730.000|TR0|premiums on medical care, not 
20110104170730.000|20110104170733.000|TR0|administrative costs. And one change you 
20110104170733.000|20110104170736.000|TR0|might not like, money from flexible 
20110104170736.000|20110104170738.000|TR0|spending accounts can no longer be used 
20110104170738.000|20110104170741.000|TR0|for over-the-counter medications unless 
20110104170741.000|20110104170743.000|TR0|you have a script.

20110104170917.000|20110104170920.000|TR0|first time a Patients' Bill of Rights, 
20110104170920.000|20110104170923.000|TR0|placing health care decisions in the hands

20110104170930.000|20110104170933.000|TR0|conditions can continue to get coverage,

20110104170936.000|20110104170938.000|TR0|plan until age 26, and pregnant women and 
20110104170938.000|20110104170941.000|TR0|breast and prostate cancer patient can no 
20110104170941.000|20110104170944.000|TR0|longer be thrown off the insurance roles

20110104172347.000|20110104172350.000|TR0|expensive.  We've got a high unemployment 
20110104172350.000|20110104172352.000|TR0|rate, people spending less money.
20110104172352.000|20110104172355.000|TR0|
20110104172355.000|20110104172357.000|TR0|But it's interesting to see where the 
20110104172357.000|20110104172400.000|TR0|price of gas is going to go.   And 
20110104172400.000|20110104172403.000|TR0|remember when gas went to $4.11 a gallon?  
20110104172403.000|20110104172405.000|TR0|People stopped buying big cars and trucks. 
20110104172405.000|20110104172408.000|TR0| It went back down and they started buying

20110104172724.000|20110104172726.000|TR0|evidence.
20110104172726.000|20110104172729.000|TR0|

20110104172731.000|20110104172734.000|TR0|
20110104172734.000|20110104172737.000|TR0|NINA MORRISON, ATTORNEY, THE INNOCENCE  
20110104172737.000|20110104172739.000|TR0|PROJECT:  Well, we know a lot about the 
20110104172739.000|20110104172742.000|TR0|history of wrongful convictions in Dallas 
20110104172742.000|20110104172745.000|TR0|County.  An enormous number of those 
20110104172745.000|20110104172747.000|TR0|individuals wrongfully convicted in Dallas 
20110104172747.000|20110104172750.000|TR0|were convicted on the basis of mistaken 
20110104172750.000|20110104172752.000|TR0|eyewitness identification.
20110104172752.000|20110104172755.000|TR0|
20110104172755.000|20110104172758.000|TR0|Fortunately, Dallas has taken enormous 
20110104172758.000|20110104172800.000|TR0|strides in recent years to improve lineup 
20110104172800.000|20110104172803.000|TR0|and photographic identification procedures 
20110104172803.000|20110104172805.000|TR0|so that what happened to Mr. Dupree 
20110104172805.000|20110104172808.000|TR0|doesn't happen to anyone one else from 
20110104172808.000|20110104172811.000|TR0|here on out.  But we are still waiting for 
20110104172811.000|20110104172813.000|TR0|the state of Texas and all of the other 
20110104172813.000|20110104172816.000|TR0|counties in Texas to join them in taking 
20110104172816.000|20110104172818.000|TR0|those measures.  And fortunately, this 
20110104172818.000|20110104172821.000|TR0|spring, the Texas legislature will again 
20110104172821.000|20110104172824.000|TR0|be taking up a bill that's been supported 
20110104172824.000|20110104172826.000|TR0|by the Texas District Attorneys 
20110104172826.000|20110104172829.000|TR0|Association to improve those procedures, 
20110104172829.000|20110104172832.000|TR0|and we're hoping in Mr. Dupree's name, and 
20110104172832.000|20110104172834.000|TR0|in the name of all of those who have been 
20110104172834.000|20110104172837.000|TR0|wrongfully convicted and now exonerated, 
20110104172837.000|20110104172839.000|TR0|it will finally pass.
20110104172839.000|20110104172842.000|TR0|

20110104172911.000|20110104172913.000|TR0|We know that there were a lot of 
20110104172913.000|20110104172916.000|TR0|wrongfully convicted people in Dallas 
20110104172916.000|20110104172919.000|TR0|County because of things that happened in 
20110104172919.000|20110104172921.000|TR0|the past.  They had a history of excluding

20110104172924.000|20110104172926.000|TR0|late '70s and early 1980s. Mr. Dupree was

20110104172929.000|20110104172932.000|TR0|contributed.
20110104172932.000|20110104172934.000|TR0|

20110104172939.000|20110104172942.000|TR0|evidence.  And Mr. Dupree's case, they

20110104174954.000|20110104174956.000|TR0|during retirement. So this is a big issue.
